articles.description: Argentina football legend Diego Maradona was suffering from liver, kidney and cardiovascular disorders but there were no signs of alcohol or narcotics consumption in his autopsy, the public prosecutor said on Thursday.
articles.content:
World Cup winning captain from Mexico 86, Maradona died of a heart-attack on November 25 at the age of 60.
